document.full_text: raising interest rates by the end of 2011 should be "on the table," depending on how the economy improves over the next few months, philadelphia federal reserve bank president charles plosser said on friday.
document.title: fed's plosser: raising rates in 2011 a possibility
lines_and_colors: raising interest rates by the end of 2011 should be "on the table," depending on how the economy improves over the next few months, philadelphia federal reserve bank president charles plosser said on friday.
